Address.label: Address
Address.value: 104 S. MAIN STREET, GREENVILLE, South Carolina, 29601, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: World Acceptance Corp operates a small-loan consumer finance business. The company offers short-term small installment loans, medium-term larger installment loans, related credit insurance and ancillary products and services to individuals. It also offers income tax return preparation services to its loan customers and other individuals.
